name: InfinitY Runner (itch) (pavelpineda)
description:
WASD To move in the menus.

ESC To exit the menus.
Space to accept / enter the menus.
Space to Jump.
Q To activate a BodyShield.
E To activate Normal Shield.

Good luck, I hope you have fun if you reach 2000 I hope you are well.
Thank you and I love you very much.

I was going to put music on it but since it is such a short game I preferred that the user use the music they love then, cheer up, and good luck.
